effect_entries.effect: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Mud-Slap Gen I: Mimic)

flavor_text_entries.text:
硬い　こぶしなどで
相手を　攻撃する。ひかりのかべや
リフレクターも　破壊できる。

The user attacks with a swift chop.
It can also break barriers, such as
Light Screen and Reflect.

Colpisce il nemico con una mano e rompe
barriere come Riflesso e Schermoluce.

Canto que sirve de ataque. Su fuerza aumenta
cuantos más Pokémon lo usan en cadena.

Das Ziel wird mit der Handkante angegriffen.
Barrieren wie Lichtschild oder Reflektor
werden zerstört.

Une attaque avec le tranchant de la main.
Permet aussi de briser les barrières comme
Mur Lumière et Protection.

주먹 등으로 공격한다.
빛의장막이나 리플렉터도
파괴할 수 있다.

こぶしなどで　こうげきする。
ひかりのかべや　リフレクターも
はかいできる。

The user attacks with tough fists,
etc. It can also break any barrier
such as Light Screen and Reflect.

The user attacks with tough fists,
etc. It can also break any barrier
such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Une attaque avec la main ou autre.
Peut briser les barrières comme Mur
Lumière et Protection.

The user attacks with tough fists,
etc. It can also break any barrier
such as Light Screen and Reflect.

The user attacks with tough fists,
etc. It can also break any barrier
such as Light Screen and Reflect.

The user attacks with tough fists,
etc. It can also break any barrier
such as Light Screen and Reflect.

An attack that also
breaks any barrier
like LIGHT SCREEN
and REFLECT.

Destroys barriers
like LIGHT SCREEN
and causes damage.

Destroys barriers
like LIGHT SCREEN
and causes damage.
